architectural_notes: UI styling: task card and modal should not be transparent; use a solid background consistently across all usages.
known_issues: Task card and modal backgrounds are currently transparent, causing confusing bleed-through of content behind them.

existing_features.title: Make every TaskCard render with a solid, non-transparent background in both light and dark themes so content behind the card does not bleed through.
Ensure all task-related modal dialogs use a solid, non-transparent background everywhere they appear, including: Create Task dialog, Edit Task dialog, and the Delete Task confirmation dialog.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix transparent backgrounds: make task card and modal use a solid (non-transparent) background everywhere they appear

projectName: Fix transparent backgrounds on task cards and task modals
